page.title: 03LIFE STYLE,CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: The general life style in this area is of quite a high standard_ partly due to the fact that unemployment figures are fairly low approx.11%. Most people in the area own their houses which are well maintained { Approx.114}households possess{T.V.'s, {45 videos, 25 computers, 60 hi_fi's,85 {radio/cassettes,23 pianos,7 electric {organs,102 washing machines,42 tumble {driers,27 micro_waves,36 food process_ {ors,93 deep freezes,96 telephones and {10 dishwashers. Most people have cars.Many are 2 or 3 car families. Many people take annual holidays_ the majority holiday in this country. Most households have pets_ mainly cats,dogs and birds. The main shopping area is{Pembroke {Dock.}Most local people occasionally visit the weekly{Carew open market.
